title: Social Security redesigned your statement, here's why you should take a long, hard look at it
text:
Here are the stock market's trading hours for Thanksgiving and Black Friday

U.S. financial markets are closed Thursday for Thanksgiving, and will close early on Black Friday. See full story.

I was mistakenly added to the deed on my father-in-law's house. What are the consequences for my family?

'About six months ago, my wife and I refinanced our house and discovered that I was on the title of my father-in-law's house.' See full story.
